item.title: 5 code metrics you need to watch
item.description: Developing software ain’t easy. How do you know how you are doing ? You could start collecting metrics about your code. These can give you some indication how maintainable and reliable it is. The metric which come to mind to the most people is code coverage. Some people say it must be near 100%, other say 80% is a good number. At the end it can’t tell you if you are doing great or good.
